response.original_title: De familie Boef - Inbraak onder hoge spanning
response.overview: To Tuur's great relief, his family has stopped stealing. OK, it took a completely botched burglary, but now they finally buy things instead of stealing everything. But then a woman claims that Tuur's dog is her stolen dog, and he discovers that his family wants to steal an expensive tiara and needs Tuur's dog for it. Sometimes things are not what they seem, and the decisions Tuur makes have consequences that no one could have foreseen.
response.tagline: When family secrets unravel, Tuur's choices could change everything.
response.title: De familie Boef - Inbraak onder hoge spanning
